channel.title: More GE Updates! Super-Asshole (Imsuperman05 + Asshole_rule, sick bastards...)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://freemakeupandmore.com/RunescapeBanner.jpg[/img]
[size=16pt]Introduction:[/size]
Despite the banner, this project [b][u]is not[/u][/b] a remake. We're replicating some of Runescape's newest features, however. Not only is the content going to be very efficient and well detailed, but there will be A TON. Anyone who knows me, or Imsuperman05, knows that we love our content perfect. Like I said, we're replicating some of Runescape's newer features, mainly meaning, combat, mini-games, maps, and miscellaneous features that we would like to add. We started this a week ago and have already made some great progress, so take a look at our media, goals, features, and more.
Key: Not started, Done, Started [size=16pt]Server & Client Goals:[/size] - Done - Clan Wars Castle Wars Fist Of Guthix Bounty Hunter Miasmic spells Re-packing Fight Pits Zombie Caves Curses Summoning - Interfaces, skill, and combat Rewrite Mining Rewrite Thieving Rewrite Fletching Rewrite Farming Rewrite Fletching Rewrite Fishing Rewrite Cooking New Banhandler Server side pathfinding Server side Npc Clipping New hitmarks - Criticals included Rewrite Potions Party Room Hunter All 508 maps (Perfect, all XTEA problems solved) 602 maps including - Nex Dorgushuun Corporeal Beast cave Ancient Cavern Everything Cache packed - besides Sprites 508 Gameframe QuickChat Base All Nex animations Others I just forgot about...
- Started -
Grand Exchange via. MySQL Fight Caves Player Owned Houses - The real shit, we almost have the packet working Duel Tournaments Pest Control Warriors guild - The real shit, will all the special token games. Quick Prayers Quick Curses Nex boss Palette system Implementing Netty Dwarf Multicannon
Not started
Barbarian Assault Soul Wars Rewrite Crafting Rewrite clan chat - Lootshare, Coinshare, ranks Can't think of anything
[size=16pt]Media[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Aq5WM.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y1dnq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vwqot.png[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PvRrFiKqxjQ
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2n733v7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/160o7sz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/5l5u8m.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2q1bdld.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1r6t7l.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ef59no.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2u9nayw.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2m5gq3b.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/jjme8n.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/20pbqd5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2mqjj1h.png[/img]
note: before i added anims [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2janvqb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2aakqxj.png[/img]
We plan on releasing when we're done. Post any comments, concerns or requests.
[/center]

item.title: More GE Updates! Super-Asshole (Imsuperman05 + Asshole_rule, sick bastards...)
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

asshole_rule:

just disable the need for settings.dat

Okay, I made it load but now it gets stuck on “Requesting Title Screen” “Connection Error - Retrying in 5 … 4 … 3 … 2 … 1…” Please help me now? Why am I getting this error I know for a fact its running the cache because I read the Signlink.

Read full topic
item.source: More GE Updates! Super-Asshole (Imsuperman05 + Asshole_rule, sick bastards...)

I didn’t even want to release it, so ask superman for help…
[/quote]
Hes not on. and come on please dude i love your work i just need to run this client,[/quote]He removed things for a reason. He fixed a lot of the mapdata by himself. I am not suprised he removed them. It took a lot of work apprently.

item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

What was the name of the base you guys used? And was it ever released? Because your Cache>user>settings.dat is fucked up and I can’t run the client without it so i need to fix it if you can help with it that’d be much appreciated and if the base you used contains a fixed .dat I’ll just take that. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: More GE Updates! Super-Asshole (Imsuperman05 + Asshole_rule, sick bastards...)
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:455, topic:426000”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=528690.msg3880280#msg3880280 date=1325983704]

To be honest, I’m ready for the release. I would love to use this as a base, though I highly doubt I’ll ever put it online. I just want to see 1 good PI that loads higher revisions that isn’t 100% half-ass

It seems like every once in a while, one server will be released that effects the rest for a really long time. Hybrid PvP would be a good example.

I want dat Castle Wars

I’m going to be totally honest, and say I just ripped Regretscapes(yh, it’s fully functional too, besides the maps).
[/quote]

Ahaha!! He make funny joke![/quote]

?

Read full topic
